input.sentences: the marching band waited to take the field .
when it was time | they marched out to the field and play their instruments .
before the game | the snow was blown off the field .
it was time for the game to begin .
after getting tackled | the football player needed help getting up .
output.sentences: We looked out at the stadium before our big performance.
I was head trumpet and was shocked at how many thousands of people were there watching us.
After our performance, maintenance cleaned the snow dust off the field.
The second half of the game started again.
Our team was not going to give up without a fight.
